item.description:
The Misted Robed Gate is a game of court intrigue inspired by films such as Couching Tiger, Hidden Dragon and the House of Flying Daggers. Players will play high officers at the Imperial court and try to outdo one another with kung-fu treachery!

This is the March (kinda) installment of our series of one-shot RPG experiences to be offered monthly over the course of 2011. Each month will feature a different GM running a new game. This month's GM is Tewhill.

Got a game on your shelf that you've been itching to run, but your regular group just isn't interested? Why not run it for us at the Role-Playing Fellowship of Greater Boston! We want to continue running one-shot games throughout 2011, and you can help!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with a mysterious silk handkerchief
item.name: March (kinda) One-Shot - Mist Robed Gate
